titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 1827) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1987, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-61.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 222 - 191 (Record Vote No: 55).

bill.summary: 4/22/1987--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 1827 (supplemental appropriations).
